Off-the-grid non-profit peer-to-peer communications iOS app
REVOLT.PM - Off the grid communications App

- 100% FREE communication without internet or cellular networks

- Conversation with walkie-talkie, chat and media files exchanges 

- Application functions without any server or database operations

- Anonymous device browsing and user nicknames identification

- Users of app must keep open to enable connections with others

- Connections over long distances possible if many users keeps app open in background to enable extended connectivity reach for others

App is not-for-profit can only be used by iPhone, iPads and iPod devices.

We learned that power-cuts are a major issue. Keeping your phone charged and powering your Wi-Fi increases the chances of rescue. 

We would like to give away the following products. 
ChargePLUS - Charges your Mobile Phone from Motorbike's battery | Basically a USB port for the motorbike. This one is fully waterproof so would work well in Chennai. 

RouterUPS - Power Backup specifically designed for WiFi Router's. This keeps your Wi-Fi router up for about 4 hours. 

We have sent several of them yesterday. If this is a real need happy to send more. Thank you.
